text:
SAMSUNG 27″ CF39 Series FHD 1080p Curved Computer Monitor
Amazon deal slashes price of popular Samsung curved monitor
This Samsung monitor was just discounted on Amazon.
WePC is reader-supported. When you buy through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Prices subject to change.
Learn more
Guess what we found on Amazon this January? An awesome deal on a stunning
PC monitor out there, and it’s friendly on the wallet. The Samsung 27″ CF39 Curved Monitor, applauded with an impressive 4.6-star rating based on over 25,000 reviews, is currently enjoying a substantial 27% discount. Renowned for its versatility, it’s an ideal choice for your everyday tasks.
This ultraslim 1080p
curved monitor is up for grabs at just $159.99, marking a notable $60 off from its original price of $219.99.
What do we like about this Samsung curved monitor deal?
- Curved Display: The dramatic 1800R curvature matches the natural field of view for increased engagement across the 27-inch screen.
- Ultra Thin Design: Measuring less than an inch, the slim, circular base and trim bezels complement minimalist workstations in style.
- Gaming Experience: Its AMD FreeSync support smooths gameplay while fast 4ms response times keep action crisp in movies and shooters alike.
- Extensive Viewing Comfort: TUV Rheinland certification verifies effective eye fatigue reduction for extended general use far beyond gaming.
- Crystal Color: The 3000:1 contrast ratio pumps color brilliance balanced with deep blacks, revealing subtle detail amid vivid images.
- Eco-Friendly Efficiency: Its auto-brightness adjustment intelligently saves power whenever possible for a reduced consumption footprint.
Should you invest in this Samsung curved monitor deal?
This 27-inch Samsung curved monitor brings an immersive viewing experience to desktop entertainment and gaming at an affordable price point. The gently wrapped 1080p screen with 1800R curvature expands your field of view for engrossing video and gameplay visuals. Fast on-screen motion looks fairly fluid as well, thanks to a speedy 4 ms response time and adaptive FreeSync technology. The display produces vibrant colors and contrast too, while an Eye Saver mode prevents strain during longer viewing periods. Connectivity is a bit limited, but the slim, modern aesthetics add style to your space. For the price of $159.99, it provides a surprisingly engaging front-row-like viewing experience.
